overall.description: Return selected slices of an array along given axis.

condition.description: Array that selects which entries to return. If len(condition) is less than the size of a along the given axis, then output is truncated to the length of the condition array.

a.description: Array from which to extract a part.

axis.description: Axis along which to take slices. If None (default), work on the flattened array.

out.description: Output array.  Its type is preserved and it must be of the right shape to hold the output.

compressed_array.description: A copy of a without the slices along axis for which condition is false.
